item.description:
Music in the Courtyard-Tierra Mestiza and Community Meal

Saturday, September 20 at 6:00 p.m.

A Latin American group, Tierra Mestiza, brings to life the musical traditions of Mexico, Cuba, Puerto Rico and other south-of-the-border countries. Instruments include guitar, cuatro puertorriqueño, quenas, violin, Latin percussion. Romantic, lively melodies and rhythms from the Latin American songbook are freshly delivered with the group's trademark, gimmick-free sound, giving life anew to classic tunes, like 'Bésame Mucho', 'La Malagueña', etc. Presented by the Colors of Music Concert Series. A community meal will be served using ingredients from our organic garden. Free.

Questions? Contact Karen, kdwo543210@yahoo.com or 860-922-7997

Directions: http://www.charteroak...

For information about the Charter Oak Cultural Center: http://www.charteroak...
item.how_to_find_us: I will be wearing a jean jacket as in my photo

group.name: The Hartford Spanish Language Meetup Group
